features: Size:Our Xmas tree mat fits any size Christmas tree.The diameter of large Christmas tree skirt is 47.2 inches (120 cm),and the diameter of small Xmas tree skirt is 35.4 inches (90 cm).Please refer to the diagram on the right for details.

Material:The Xmas tree skirt is made of high-quality polyester, and the strong Christmas tree mat can be reused many times. Hand washable and machine washable. Dry in a cool place and avoid long-term exposure to sunlight.
Occasion: Various patterns of Christmas tree skirts are available for you to choose from, adding the Christmas atmosphere.Christmas decorations such as living room, courtyard and outdoor.

Design: Simple and convenient opening design, easy to install and disassemble.The design of three straps makes the Christmas tree skirt stronger.The Exquisite wrapping edge shows the higher quality of the Christmas tree skirt.
Better service for satisfied shopping experience:This Christmas Tree Skirt is very popular, but if you have any questions, please contact us. Our customer service will reply within 24 hours.
description: This Christmas Tree Floor Mat is very suitable for celebrations of holiday themed parties, special events or any other themed occasions, and is very effective to increase the festive atmosphere.This is the perfect Christmas decoration and a perfect Christmas gift for family or friends. It will not only add more atmosphere to your home, but also show your unique taste.

We have all kinds of patterns, such as Santa Claus, snowflakes, snowman, reindeer and Christmas tree patterns, "Merry Christmas", "Happy Holidays" and "Welcome" letters, etc. There is always one that suits you!
Three straps design, easy to use, and make the Christmas tree door mat stronger.
The surface of the Christmas tree skirt is made of imitated super soft suede, which has a good feel.
For the long-term use of the Christmas Tree Skirt, please do not add bleach when washing!
The invisible nails delivered are not suitable for walls such as tiles!
